Texto: 
rbcs in urine.
heterogeneous mass of the superior pole of the right kidney with an associated mass in the bladder.
renal cell carcinoma
• renal cell carcinoma
• transitional cell carcinoma
65 year old man with no significant past medical history presented with right flank pain radiating to the groin.  has history of nephrolithiasis (unknown type) 6-7 years ago.  he is a ppd smoker for 40 years.
